credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Light Bursting over Beach with Rock
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
description: Small, calm waves coming onto shore, rock in bottom left corner. Miscellaneous pen strokes in all margins outside image.
name: Sketchbook folio
